snippet: Kelly Carlin, the daughter of George Carlin, will host a monthly show on Sirius XM radio. The first of her interviews, with the actor and comedian Robin Williams, is to be broadcast on Sunday.
abstract: Kelly Carlin, the daughter of George Carlin, will host a monthly show on Sirius XM radio. The first of her interviews, with the actor and comedian Robin Williams, is to be broadcast on Sunday.

headline.main: Seven Words You Can Say on Radio: Carlin's Daughter Gets a Comedy Interview Show
headline.print_headline: George Carlin’s Daughter to Host A Comedy Interview Show
